channel.title: Fight Pits problem whit attacking
channel.description: I have finnaly added fight pits to my source(508 codeusa).They work fine,but when game starts i cant attack players.I added that if u are in fight pits it is pvp but still u cant attack other players.When i attack i get "Cant attack players outside wilderness".Could some one tell me what i am missing? :rolleyes:

item.title: Fight Pits problem whit attacking
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

I have finnaly added fight pits to my source(508 codeusa).They work fine,but when game starts i cant attack players.I added that if u are in fight pits it is pvp but still u cant attack other players.When i attack i get “Cant attack players outside wilderness”.Could some one tell me what i am missing? :rolleyes:
